sami.beerbudget.budget

Class Budget

  • java.lang.Object
    • sami.beerbudget.budget.Budget

  • public class Budget
extends Object
    Budget is the holder of all information.
    Author:
    saklindq Budget holds all incomes and expenses of the user.

        Returns:

      • addExpense

        public void addExpense(String name,
                       double amount,
                       Date expiration,
                       boolean monthly)
        Creates and adds an expense to the Budget.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the new expense.
        amount - is the amount of the new expense. Always positive.
        expiration - is the due date of the expense.
        monthly - decides whether the expense is going to be payed once or monthly.

      • addIncome

        public void addIncome(String name,
                      double amount,
                      Date expiration,
                      boolean monthly)
        Creates and adds an income to the Budget.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the new income.
        amount - is the amount of the new income. Always positive.
        expiration - is the due date of the income.
        monthly - decides whether the income is going to be payed once or monthly.

        public ArrayList<MoneyFlow> getIncomes()
        Get Incomes.
        Returns:
        ALL the Incomes.
